column4: ‏hi,anyone can help me to make my wireless driver?‫make[1]: *** No rule to make target `/usr/src/linux-headers-2.6.28-13-generic/pwd/Makefile'.  Stop
hi anyone can help me to make wireless driver?
is it internal or usb?
actually it is an make error ,i did it before with a patch,but i cant now,cant find the patch
then pastebin the error you get, maybe someone can advise
morteza@Moris:~/wdriver$ make -C /lib/modules/2.6.28-13-generic/build M='pwd' clean
i said pastebin
imagine if say 10 people did that, the channel would be useless. Think next time
sorry,http://paste.ubuntu.com/216176/
the kernel source is already referenced, try just running   make clean
if you run:   file /usr/src/linux-headers-2.6.28-13-generic
does it say it is a folder?
do u mean enter"make clean"?
makes sense, yes
make: *** No rule to make target `clean'.  Stop.
have you read the install and readme files in the archive you extracted?
yes
where did you get the archive, i'll have a look at it
i ask it someone in #kernel,M=$pwd instead of M='pwd',and it worked,thanks
you may want to tell the person who made the guide
so it can be updated to be correct
